attributes.action: make serious case reviews open and transparent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When you lose a loved one through no fault of your own and they have suffered neglect and abuse you will if you are lucky have a serious case review to find out what went wrong and to learn from the failings. The full report may or may not be published. It May be blacked out in parts. You as a family member may or not be given a copy. We as a country needed guide lines on how to conduct a serious case review, and transparency so that all those involved can learn from their mistakes.
